<style id="sccss">/* PRODUCTION CSS */

/* BACK TO TOP BUTTON */

.fa {
    display: inline-block;
    font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    font-size: inherit;
    text-rendering: auto;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
#back_to_top {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  z-index: 99;
  font-size: 18px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: #B66611;
  color: #FFF;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}
#back_to_top:hover {
  background-color: #582202;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {

}

/* MOBILE ADS */

.mobile-ad-in-content {
    text-align: center;
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
    /* HIDE CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH */
    .mobile-ad-in-content, .fl-col.mobile-ad-in-content {

    }
    /* DISPLAY CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH AND BEAVER BUILDER EDITING MODE */
    .fl-builder-edit .mobile-ad-in-content {
        display: block;
    }
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
    /* HIDE SIDEBAR MOBILE ADS ON MOBILE */

types-not-from-na-taiwan entry override" aria-label="Windsor Blend"><header class="entry-header"></header><div class="entry-content">	<div class="review-template">
		<div class="row row-1">
			<div class="column col-1">
				<span class="review-template-rating">92</span>
			</div>
			<div class="column col-2">
								<p class="review-roaster">Nodi Coffee</p>
				<h1 class="review-title">Windsor Blend</h1>
						</div>
			<div class="column col-3">
						</div>
		</div>
		<div class="row row-2">
						<div class="column col-1">
				<table class="review-template-table">
																		<tr>

					<table class="review-template-table">

		<h2>Blind Assessment</h2>
		<p>Gently fruit-toned, delicately floral. Apricot, cocoa nib, freesia, agave syrup, cedar in aroma and cup. Gentle, round acidity; crisp, velvety mouthfeel. Cocoa-driven finish with undertones of apricot.</p>

		
		<h2>Notes</h2>
		<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">A blend of two coffees, one Ethiopia and one Rwanda, both washed. Nodi, which means “knots” in Latin, is a roastery and coffee shop with locations in Hong Kon and Shanghai. Visit </span><strong><a href="https://www.nodicoffee.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener">www.nodicoffee.com</a></strong><span style="font-weight: 400;"> for more information.</span></p>

		<h2>Bottom Line</h2> <p>Bright stone fruit and crisp cocoa nib characterize this balanced, sweet-toned Ethiopia-Rwanda blend.</p><h2>Explore Similar Coffees</h2><p><a href="/all-reviews/?roaster_name=Nodi+Coffee" title="Click here for more reviews from Nodi Coffee." rel="nofollow">Click here</a> for more reviews from <b>Nodi Coffee</b></p><div class="column col-2"></div>	</div>

					var items = document.getElementsByClassName('cr-advertiser-widget-content'), i, len;
					if ( passedArray[ randomImageNumber ].url === "" ) {
						for ( i = 0, len = items.length; i < len; i++ ) {
							items[i].innerHTML = passedArray[ randomImageNumber ].thumb;
						}
					} else {
						for ( i = 0, len = items.length; i < len; i++ ) {
							items[i].innerHTML = '<a href="' + passedArray[ randomImageNumber ].url + '" target="_blank" rel="nofollow" title="' + passedArray[ randomImageNumber ].excerpt + '">' + passedArray[ randomImageNumber ].thumb + '</a>';
						}
					}
				}
			}

<style id="sccss">/* PRODUCTION CSS */

/* BACK TO TOP BUTTON */

.fa {
    display: inline-block;
    font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    font-size: inherit;
    text-rendering: auto;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
#back_to_top {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  z-index: 99;
  font-size: 18px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: #B66611;
  color: #FFF;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}
#back_to_top:hover {
  background-color: #582202;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
        #back_to_top {
                display: none !important;
        }
}

/* MOBILE ADS */

.mobile-ad-in-content {
    text-align: center;
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
    /* HIDE CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH */
    .mobile-ad-in-content, .fl-col.mobile-ad-in-content {
        display: none;
    }
    /* DISPLAY CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH AND BEAVER BUILDER EDITING MODE */
    .fl-builder-edit .mobile-ad-in-content {
        display: block;
    }
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
    /* HIDE SIDEBAR MOBILE ADS ON MOBILE */
    .sidebar #cr_advertiser_widget-2, 
    .sidebar #strong-testimonials-view-widget-2 {
        display: none;
    }
}

/* FORMS */

.gform_confirmation_wrapper {
    background: #eee;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    padding: 20px;  
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 641px) {
    .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .gfield_label {
    width: 49%;
    }
    html:not([dir="rtl"]) .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .ginput_container:not(.ginput_container_time):not(.ginput_container_date), html:not([dir="rtl"]) .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .clear-multi, html:not([dir="rtl"]) .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .gfield_description     {
    width: 70%;
    margin-left: 49%;
    }
}

/* NEW POPUPS */

}

}

}

.theme-23144 .pum-content {

}

}
.theme-22227 .gform_wrapper input[type=submit] {
    background-color: #91010a;
}
.theme-22227 .gform_wrapper input[type=submit]:hover {
    background-color: #5E0107;
}
.theme-19609 .pum-form__messages, 
.theme-22227 .pum-form__messages {
    background: #ecf0f1;
    border: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 999;
}

.theme-22227 .pum-form__messages .pum-form__message--success {
    color: #000 !important;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 790px) {

    }

    }
    .pum-theme-19609 .pum-container,

    }
    .pum-theme-23144 .pum-container,

        background-image: url('/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/popup-survey-background-320x440-1.jpg') !important;
    }
		.theme-23144 .pum-content a {
				display: block;

				width: 189px;
		}
    .theme-19597 .pum-content img, 
    .theme-19781 .pum-content img {
        margin: 0 auto 14px auto;

        margin: 0 0 1px 25px;
    }
        .theme-22227 .pum-content #gform_wrapper_5 {
        margin: 0 0 1px 17px;
    }

                line-height: initial;
        }

/* ADVERTISERS WIDGET */

.cr_random_advertiser_image_link, .cr-advertiser-widget-content {
    min-height: 200px;
    text-align: center;
}
.widget_advertiser_ad {
    text-align: center;
}

/* ADVERTISERS PAGE */

.sponsor-logo, .sponsor-info {
    display: inline-block;
}
.sponsor-logo {
    border: 1px solid #CCC;
  -webkit-border-radius: 8px;
  -moz-border-radius: 8px;
  border-radius: 8px;
    margin: 0 2% 20px 0;
    padding: 2%;
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: top;
    width: 18%;
}

  display: inline-block;
  height: 100%;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.sponsor-logo img {
    vertical-align: middle;
}
.sponsor-info {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    width: 75%;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 570px) {
    .sponsor-info, .sponsor-info {
        display: block;
        margin-right: 0;
    width: 100%;
    }
}

/* HEADER WIDGETS */

.site-header .widget-area .widget:first-of-type {
    float: left;
}
.site-header .widget-area .widget:last-of-type {
    float: right;

/* TRANSPARENT INPUT FIELDS */

input::-webkit-input-placeholder, textarea::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* WebKit, Blink, Edge */
    color: #999;
}
input:-moz-placeholder, textarea:-moz-placeholder { /* Mozilla Firefox 4 to 18 */
    color: #999;
    opacity: 1;
}
input::-moz-placeholder, textarea::-moz-placeholder { /* Mozilla Firefox 19+ */
    color: #999;
    opacity: 1;
}
input:-ms-input-placeholder, textarea:-ms-input-placeholder { /* Internet Explorer 10-11 */
    color: #999;
}
input:placeholder-shown, textarea:placeholder-shown { /* Standard */
    color: #999;
}
input:focus::-webkit-input-placeholder, textarea:focus::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* WebKit, Blink, Edge */
    color: transparent;
}
input:focus:-moz-placeholder, textarea:focus:-moz-placeholder { /* Mozilla Firefox 4 to 18 */
    color: transparent;
    opacity: 0;
}

types-estates types-kenya types-washed-wet cities-madison entry override" aria-label="Nyeri Hill Kenya"><header class="entry-header"></header><div class="entry-content">	<div class="review-template">
		<div class="row row-1">
			<div class="column col-1">

			</div>
			<div class="column col-2">
								<p class="review-roaster">JBC Coffee Roasters</p>
				<h1 class="review-title">Nyeri Hill Kenya</h1>
						</div>
			<div class="column col-3">
			<a href="https://www.jbccoffeeroasters.com/product-category/coffee/" target="_blank" title="JBC Coffee Roasters" rel="noopener"><img width="150" height="150" src="https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1-150x150.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail size-thumbnail" alt="JBC Coffee Roasters Logo" decoding="async" loading="lazy" srcset="https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1-150x150.jpg 150w, https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1-75x75.jpg 75w, https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1.jpg 200w" sizes="(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px" /></a>			</div>

						<div class="column col-1">
				<table class="review-template-table">

		<h2>Blind Assessment</h2>
		<p>Richly sweet-tart. Blackberry compote, cocoa nib, toffee, lemon verbena, cedar in aroma and cup. Especially lively, juicy-bright acidity; plush, syrupy mouthfeel. Toffee and blackberry notes center the long finish.</p>

		
		<h2>Notes</h2>
		<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Produced at Nyeri Hill Estate, from trees of the SL28, SL34 and Riuru 11 varieties of Arabica, and processed by the traditional washed method (fruit skin and pulp removed before drying). JBC Coffee Roasters’ vision is simple: “let the coffee lead the way” through sourcing and roasting the best and most unique coffees available and rewarding the farmers who grow those coffees with substantial premiums. Visit</span><a href="https://www.jbccoffeeroasters.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><b> www.jbccoffeeroasters.com</b></a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> or call 608-256-5282 for more information.</span></p>

		<h2>Bottom Line</h2> <p>A complex, multi-layered, classic Kenya cup, berry-forward, and cocoa-toned, with sparkling acidity.</p><h2>Explore Similar Coffees</h2><p><a href="/all-reviews/?roaster_name=JBC+Coffee+Roasters" title="Click here for more reviews from JBC Coffee Roasters." rel="nofollow">Click here</a> for more reviews from <b>JBC Coffee Roasters</b></p><p><a href="https://www.coffeereview.com/coffee-origins/kenya/">Click here</a> for more information about coffees from <b>Kenya</b></p><div class="column col-2"><strong><a href="https://www.jbccoffeeroasters.com/product-category/coffee/" target="_blank" title="JBC Coffee Roasters" style="text-decoration: none;" rel="noopener"><b>Visit JBC Coffee Roasters</b></a></strong></div>	</div>

<style id="sccss">/* PRODUCTION CSS */

/* BACK TO TOP BUTTON */

.fa {
    display: inline-block;
    font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    font-size: inherit;
    text-rendering: auto;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
#back_to_top {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  z-index: 99;
  font-size: 18px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: #B66611;
  color: #FFF;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}
#back_to_top:hover {
  background-color: #582202;
}

}

/* MOBILE ADS */

.mobile-ad-in-content {
    text-align: center;
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
    /* HIDE CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH */

    }
    /* DISPLAY CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH AND BEAVER BUILDER EDITING MODE */
    .fl-builder-edit .mobile-ad-in-content {
        display: block;
    }
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
    /* HIDE SIDEBAR MOBILE ADS ON MOBILE */

		<h2>Blind Assessment</h2>
		<p>Richly sweet, floral-toned. Nutella, magnolia, orange zest, agave syrup, cedar in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; crisp, satiny mouthfeel. Chocolaty, nutty finish with floral undertones.</p>

		
		<h2>Notes</h2>
		<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Produced by Rene Contreras on the family farm in Monte Verde and processed by the traditional washed method (fruit skin and flesh are removed from the beans before they are dried). Speedwell Coffee, based in Plymouth, Massachusetts, is a wholesale and retail specialty roaster particularly dedicated to offering attractive coffee subscription plans. For more information, visit</span><a href="https://speedwellcoffee.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> <b>www.speedwellcoffee.com</b></a><span style="font-weight: 400;">. </span></p>

		<h2>Bottom Line</h2> <p>A harmonious, floral and chocolaty washed El Salvador with especially inviting acidity, juicy and bright.</p><h2>Explore Similar Coffees</h2><p><a href="/all-reviews/?roaster_name=Speedwell+Coffee" title="Click here for more reviews from Speedwell Coffee." rel="nofollow">Click here</a> for more reviews from <b>Speedwell Coffee</b></p><p><a href="https://www.coffeereview.com/coffee-reference/coffee-categories/geographic-origins/coffees-from-the-americas/el-salvador/">Click here</a> for more information about coffees from <b>El Salvador</b></p><div class="column col-2"><strong><a href="https://speedwellcoffee.com/" target="_blank" title="Speedwell Coffee" style="text-decoration: none;" rel="noopener"><b>Visit Speedwell Coffee</b></a></strong></div>	</div>

<style id="sccss">/* PRODUCTION CSS */

/* BACK TO TOP BUTTON */

.fa {
    display: inline-block;
    font: normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    font-size: inherit;
    text-rendering: auto;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}
#back_to_top {
  display: none;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 20px;
  left: 20px;
  z-index: 99;
  font-size: 18px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  background-color: #B66611;
  color: #FFF;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}
#back_to_top:hover {
  background-color: #582202;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 480px) {
        #back_to_top {
                display: none !important;
        }
}

/* MOBILE ADS */

.mobile-ad-in-content {
    text-align: center;
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 1201px) {
    /* HIDE CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH */
    .mobile-ad-in-content, .fl-col.mobile-ad-in-content {
        display: none;
    }
    /* DISPLAY CONTENT MOBILE ADS WHEN IN DESKTOP BROWSER WIDTH AND BEAVER BUILDER EDITING MODE */
    .fl-builder-edit .mobile-ad-in-content {
        display: block;
    }
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 1200px) {
    /* HIDE SIDEBAR MOBILE ADS ON MOBILE */
    .sidebar #cr_advertiser_widget-2, 
    .sidebar #strong-testimonials-view-widget-2 {
        display: none;
    }
}

/* FORMS */

.gform_confirmation_wrapper {
    background: #eee;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    padding: 20px;  
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 641px) {
    .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .gfield_label {
    width: 49%;
    }
    html:not([dir="rtl"]) .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .ginput_container:not(.ginput_container_time):not(.ginput_container_date), html:not([dir="rtl"]) .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .clear-multi, html:not([dir="rtl"]) .gform_wrapper ul.gform_fields:not(.top_label) .gfield_description     {
    width: 70%;
    margin-left: 49%;
    }
}

    margin: 0 0 26px 400px;

}

}

.theme-22227 .gform_wrapper input[type=submit] {

.theme-22227 .gform_wrapper input[type=submit] {
    background-color: #91010a;
}
.theme-22227 .gform_wrapper input[type=submit]:hover {
    background-color: #5E0107;
}
.theme-19609 .pum-form__messages, 
.theme-22227 .pum-form__messages {
    background: #ecf0f1;
    border: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 10px;

}

.theme-22227 .pum-form__messages .pum-form__message--success {

}

								<p class="review-roaster">JBC Coffee Roasters</p>
				<h1 class="review-title">Cordillera de Fuego Costa Rica</h1>
						</div>
			<div class="column col-3">
			<a href="https://www.jbccoffeeroasters.com/product-category/coffee/" target="_blank" title="JBC Coffee Roasters" rel="noopener"><img width="150" height="150" src="https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1-150x150.jpg" class="attachment-thumbnail size-thumbnail" alt="JBC Coffee Roasters Logo" decoding="async" loading="lazy" srcset="https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1-150x150.jpg 150w, https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1-75x75.jpg 75w, https://www.coffeereview.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/jbclogo_200x200_72dpi1.jpg 200w" sizes="(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px" /></a>			</div>

		<h2>Blind Assessment</h2>
		<p>Richly sweet, deeply spice-toned. Cinnamon, clove, dark chocolate, pie cherry, sandalwood in aroma and cup. Bright, balanced acidity; full, syrupy-smooth mouthfeel. The finish consolidates to notes of dark and clove with undertones of sandalwood.</p>

		
		<h2>Notes</h2>
		<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Produced by Luis Eduardo Campos, from trees of the Caturra and Catuai varieties of Arabica, and processed by the anaerobic natural method (fermented in an oxygen-free environment, then dried in the whole fruit). JBC Coffee Roasters’ vision is simple: “let the coffee lead the way” through sourcing and roasting the best and most unique coffees available and rewarding the farmers who grow those coffees with substantial premiums. Visit</span><a href="https://www.jbccoffeeroasters.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><b> www.jbccoffeeroasters.com</b></a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> or call 608-256-5282 for more information.</span></p>

		<h2>Bottom Line</h2> <p>A thoroughly spice-toned anaerobic Costa Rica, richly aromatic, with support from dark chocolate and stone fruit notes throughout the profile.</p><h2>Explore Similar Coffees</h2><p><a href="/all-reviews/?roaster_name=JBC+Coffee+Roasters" title="Click here for more reviews from JBC Coffee Roasters." rel="nofollow">Click here</a> for more reviews from <b>JBC Coffee Roasters</b></p><p><a href="https://www.coffeereview.com/coffee-reference/coffee-categories/geographic-origins/coffees-from-the-americas/costa-rica/">Click here</a> for more information about coffees from <b>Costa Rica</b></p><div class="column col-2"><strong><a href="https://www.jbccoffeeroasters.com/product-category/coffee/" target="_blank" title="JBC Coffee Roasters" style="text-decoration: none;" rel="noopener"><b>Visit JBC Coffee Roasters</b></a></strong></div>	</div>

                elements_selector: "iframe[data-lazy-src]",
                data_src: "lazy-src",

                class_loading: "lazyloading",
                class_loaded: "lazyloaded",

                callback_loaded: function(element) {

                                    jQuery(element).parent().fitVids();
                                }

                    }

            var lazyLoadInstance = e.detail.instance;

            if (window.MutationObserver) {
                var observer = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) {
                    var image_count = 0;
                    var iframe_count = 0;
                    var rocketlazy_count = 0;

                    mutations.forEach(function(mutation) {

                            if (typeof mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName !== 'function') {
                                continue;
                            }

                            if (typeof mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByClassName !== 'function') {
                                continue;
                            }

                            images = mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('img');

                            iframes = mutation.addedNodes[i].getElementsByTagName('iframe');

                            if(is_image){
